lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin rUp rMg AMg AMg Cib kotin kotwin s√çwd rs ibMjnwd kY
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Roop Rang Ang Ang Chhabi , Kotani Kotaani Svaad Ras Binjanaad Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Countless forms and colours, beauty of various parts of body and enjoying the tastes of meals;

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin koit bwsnw subws ris kotin kotwin koit rwg nwd bwd kY
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Koti Baasanaa Soubaas Rasi , Kotani Kotaani Koti Raag Naad Baad Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Countless fragrances, sensualities, tastes, singing modes, melodies and sounding of musical instruments;

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin koit iriD isiD iniD suDw koitin kotwin igAwn iDAwn krmwid kY
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Koti Ridhi Sidhi Nidhi Sudhaa , Kotini Kotaani Giaan Dhiaan Karamaadi Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Countless miraculous powers, elixir like pleasure-giving store houses of goods, contemplation and following of rites and rituals;

lines.gurmukhi: sgl pdwrQ huie kotin kotwin gun pujis n Dwm aupkwr ibsmwid kY ]131]
lines.transliteration_english: Sagal Padaarad Hui Kotani Kotaani Gouna , Pujasi N Dhaam Oupakaar Bisamaadi Kai ?131?

Shabad OS B.translation: And if all that had been said above become million times more, cannot match with the good done by persons of saintly temperament. (131)
